src:
Bajern izabrao Vengera
Francuz želi u Minhen...

06 Nov 2019


Bajern je pobedio večeras Olimpijakos i zalečio rane od onog debakla u Frankfurtu za vikend, ali ta pobeda, pa čak ni eventualna subotnja u derbiju sa Dortmundom, neće uticati na sudbinu privremenog rešenja na klupi - Hans Petera Flika.

Uvek dobro obavešteni Bild večeras javlja da je uprava Bavaraca napravila prve konkretne korake po pitanju pronalaženja trajnijeg rešenja za klupu i da su obavljeni preliminarni razgovori sa predstavnicima Arsena Vengera. Iskusni Francuz pominjao se prethodnih dana u nekim kombinacijama, ali niko ga nije smatrao ozbiljnim kandidatom. Prednost su uglavnom imali Erik ten Hag i Ralf Rangnik.
Henes i Rumenige, očito, drugačije razmišljaju. Venger je njihov izbor, a ni legendarni trener Arsenala nije "ravnodušan" prema ljubavnim signalima iz Minhena. Bild navodi da je 70-godišnji stručnjak spreman da prihvati ponudu Bajerna, bez obzira što bi se najverovatnije radilo o kratkoročnom ugovoru, odnosno do kraja sezone.
Navodno, isti izvor tvrdi da Bajern želi iskusnog stručnjaka koji bi pokušao da izvuče maksimum iz ove sezone koja nije najbolje krenula, a da tokom proleća pokuša da pronađe mlađeg trenera, za duge staze.
Očekuje se da Arsen Venger posle utakmice Bajern - Dortmund obavi zvanične pregovore sa upravom Bavaraca i da stavi paraf na ugovor. 

Foto: Reuters
text:
Bayern chose Wenger
French wants to Munich ...

06 Nov 2019


Bayern won the Olympiakos tonight and healed the wounds of that debacle in Frankfurt over the weekend, but that victory, or even a possible Saturday in the Dortmund derby, will not affect the fate of the interim bench decision - Hans Peter Flik.

The always-well-informed Bild reports tonight that the Bavarians have taken the first concrete steps to find a more permanent solution for the bench and that preliminary talks have been held with Arsene Wenger's representatives. The experienced Frenchman had been mentioned in previous days in some combinations, but no one considered him a serious candidate. Erik ten The Hague and Ralf Rangnik took priority.
Henes and Rumenige, obviously, think differently. Wenger is their choice, and not even the legendary Arsenal coach is "indifferent" to Munich's love signals. Bild states that the 70-year-old expert is ready to accept Bayern's offer, regardless of what would likely be a short-term contract, that is, by the end of the season.
Reportedly, the same source claims that Bayern wants an experienced expert who would try to get the most out of this season that didn't go well without trying to find a younger coach in the long run this spring.
Arsen Wenger is expected to formally negotiate with the Bavarians after the Bayern - Dortmund game and to sign a contract.

Photo by Reuters
